trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The anarch fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The archon és Saviesa ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The archon pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Eye of the Law
entries: As a bonus action, the archon can target a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and determine which laws that creature has broken in the last 24 hours.

trait.name: Mount
entries: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not {@condition incapacitated}, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Destresa saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The archon makes two Hammer of Justice attacks.

action.name: Hammer of Justice
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de força. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 18} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Pacifying Presence
entries: Each creature of the archon's choice that the archon can see within 120 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18}, or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its concentration on any spells or other effects, and becomes {@condition charmed} by the archon for 1 minute. La criatura {@condition charmed} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a archon's Pacifying Presence durant les properes 24 hores.

legendary.name: Rejoin Mount
entries: If the archon isn't mounted, it magically teleports to its steed and mounts it as long as the archon and its steed are on the same plane of existence.

legendary.name: Smite (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The archon makes a Hammer of Justice attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Detention (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The archon targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 18} or be magically teleported to a harmless demiplane until the end of the archon's next turn, whereupon the target reappears in the space it left or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The arclight phoenix doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Grounded Lightning
entries: The first time on a turn that the arclight phoenix touches the ground, it takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de força.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The arclight phoenix sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

trait.name: Lightning Form
entries: The arclight phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric. In addition, the arclight phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric.

trait.name: Crackling Death
entries: When the arclight phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat. The explosion destroys the phoenix but leaves behind a Tiny, warm egg with a mizzium shell. The egg contains the embryo of a new arclight phoenix. It hatches when it is in the area of a spell that deals lightning damage, or if a creature touches the egg and expends spell slots whose combined levels equal 13 or more. When it hatches, the egg releases a new arclight phoenix that appears in the egg's space.

action.name: Arclight Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany elèctric, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the phoenix's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18} or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany elèctric.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Aurelia falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Aurelia té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Aurelia makes three longsword attacks and uses Leadership.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) de dany tallant, o 13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dos mans, plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Leadership
entries: Aurelia utters a few inspiring words to one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the creature can hear her, it can add a {@dice d10} to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of Aurelia's next turn.

action.name: Warleader's Helix {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 17} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany radiant, and Aurelia can choose another creature she can see within 10 feet of the target. The second creature regains 27 ({@dice 6d8}) hit points.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Aurelia adds 7 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Aurelia must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When Aurelia is subjected to an effect that would move her, knock her {@condition prone}, or both, she can use her reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Command Allies
entries: Aurelia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. If a chosen creature can see or hear Aurelia, it can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Longsword Attack (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Aurelia makes one longsword attack.

legendary.name: Frighten Foes (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Aurelia targets up to five creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 25} or be {@condition frightened} of her until the end of her next turn. Any target within 5 feet of Aurelia has disadvantage on the saving throw.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The angel té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The angel fa dos atacs melé. It also uses Battlefield Inspiration.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany radiant. If the target is within 5 feet of any of the angel's allies, the target takes an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Battlefield Inspiration
entries: The angel chooses up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Until the end of the angel's next turn, each target can add a {@dice d4} to its attack rolls and saving throws.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Bolstering Presence
entries: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The biomancer té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Feed on Fire
entries: If the weird takes fire damage from a spell or other magical effect, its size increases by one category. If there isn't enough room for the weird to increase in size, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available. While the weird is Large or bigger, it makes Força checks and saving throws with advantage. If the weird starts its turn at Gargantuan size, the weird releases energy in an explosion. Each creature within 30 feet of the weird ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. The explosion ignites flammable objects in the area que ningú estigui portant o vestint. The weird's size then becomes Medium.

trait.name: Form of Fire and Water
entries: The weird can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the weird can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time the weird enters another creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the burning creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the weird or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The weird sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc, o 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc if the weird is Large or bigger.

monster.name: Blood Drinker Vampire
languages: the languages it knew in life

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The vampire makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is humanoid, ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition charmed} by the vampire for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target is infatuated with the vampire. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The vampire adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the vampire must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Blood Witch
languages: Abyssal plus any one language (usually Common)

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The witch és Carisma ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The witch pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Blood Witch Dance
entries: The witch can use a bonus action to control the movement of one creature cursed by its hex spell that it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 15} or use its reaction to move up to 30 feet in a direction of the witch's choice.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the witch's darkvision.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The witch fa dos atacs: one with its longsword and one with its shortsword.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Durant aquesta presa, l'objectiu també està {@condition restrained}, and the giant can't use this attack on anyone else.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Furious Defense
entries: After a creature the giant can see is dealt damage by a foe within 20 feet of the giant, the giant makes a chain attack against that foe.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Borborygmos falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: Borborygmos has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: Borborygmos fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Borborygmos can use his Presència Aterradora. He also fa dos atacs: one with his maul and one with his stomp.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 21} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of Borborygmos's choice that is within 60 feet of him and can see or hear him ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or become {@condition frightened} of him for 1 minute. La criatura {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Borborygmos's Presència Aterradora for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Borborygmos makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Bellow (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Borborygmos yells menacingly at one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. That creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or become {@condition frightened} of him for 1 minute. If the creature is already {@condition frightened}, it becomes {@condition stunned} instead. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Borborygmos's Bellow for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wide Berth (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Borborygmos moves up to half his speed and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time Borborygmos enters a creature's space during this move, la criatura ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21}. If the saving throw succeeds, the creature is pushed 5 feet away from Borborygmos. If the saving throw fails, that creature is knocked {@condition prone}, and Borborygmos can make a stomp attack against it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The cackler és Carisma ({@dc 11} salvada de conjur, {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The cackler pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Last Laugh
entries: When the cackler dies, it releases a dying laugh that scars the minds of other nearby creatures. Each creature within 10 feet of the cackler ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The cackler can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 11} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The krasis pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The krasis fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The krasis pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The krasis fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The krasis pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The krasis fa tres atacs: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 19} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The dryad's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). The dryad pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The dryad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the dryad shared a language.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dryad fa tres atacs, using its vine staff, its longbow, or both.

action.name: Vine Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17} or become {@condition restrained} by twisting vines for 1 minute. A target {@condition restrained} in this way can use an action to make a {@dc 17} Força (Atletisme) or Destresa (Acrobàcies) check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Summon Mount (1/Dia)
entries: The dryad magically summons a mount, which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the dryad. The mount remains for 8 hours, until it or the dryad dies, or until the dryad dismisses it as an action. The mount uses the stat block of an {@creature elk} (see the Monster Manual) with these changes: it is a plant instead of a beast, it has an Intel·ligència of 6, and it understands Sylvan but can't speak. While within 1 mile of the mount, the dryad can communicate with it telepathically.

action.name: Suppress Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: The dryad targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the dryad is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, or until the dryad uses a bonus action to end the effect.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The blastseeker és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The blastseeker pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others

trait.name: Empowered Spell (3/Dia)
entries: When the blastseeker rolls damage for a spell, it can reroll up to four dice of damage. It must use the new dice.

trait.name: Tides of Chaos (1/Dia)
entries: The blastseeker makes one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with advantage.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The blastseeker és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The blastseeker pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others

trait.name: Counterflux Overcast {@recharge 5}
entries: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a {@dice d6} to determine the effect: 1-3. The blastseeker creates a 15-foot-radius {@condition invisible} sphere centered on itself that lasts fins el final del seu proper torn. Creatures in the sphere have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. 4-6. The blastseeker creates a 15-foot-radius {@condition invisible} sphere centered on itself that lasts fins el final del seu proper torn. Creatures in the sphere have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The angel és Carisma ({@dc 19} salvada de conjur, {@hit 11} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The angel pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Exploitation of the Debtors
entries: As a bonus action, the angel targets a creature {@condition charmed} by it that it can see within 30 feet of it. The angel deals 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic to the target, and the angel gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The angel té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The angel fa dos atacs with its scythe. It can substitute Chains of Obligation for one of these attacks.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Chains of Obligation
entries: The angel targets one creature {@condition charmed} by it that it can see within 90 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 19} or become {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The lich is a 14th-level Golgari spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the lich falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The lich recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the lich takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the lich's next turn. The lich dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The lich té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the lich to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the lich drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Noxious Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 17} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. headerEntries: The druid is a 12th-level Gruul spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

monster.name: Felidar
languages: understands Celestial and Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The felidar can magically bond with one creature it can see, right after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the felidar bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. This bond has the following effects: The felidar and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet. The felidar can sense the direction and distance to the bonded creature if they're on the same plane of existence. As an action, the felidar or the bonded creature can sense what the other sees and hears, during which time it loses its own sight and hearing. This effect lasts until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The felidar has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: If the felidar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the felidar can make one claw attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The felidar fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes

variant.name: Winged Felidars

The blastseeker teleports, swapping places with a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. 4-6. The blastseeker and each creature within 10 feet of ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de tro.

action.name: Frightening Screech {@recharge 5}

La criatura {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a horror's Frightening Screech durant les properes 24 hores.

headerEntries: Isperia is a 15th-level Azorius spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 23} salvada de conjur, {@hit 14} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Inescrutable
entries: Isperia is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Saviesa (Insight) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Isperia falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Isperia té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 23} or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany psíquic after each attack it makes against Isperia before the start of her next turn.

action.name: Supreme Legal Authority
entries: Isperia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 90 feet of her. Each target ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 23} or Isperia chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, or Use an Object. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can end the effect on itself with a successful {@dc 23} Intel·ligència saving throw. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to Isperia's Supreme Legal Authority for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: Isperia makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Isperia casts a spell of 3rd level or lower from her list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Supreme Legal Authority (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Isperia uses Supreme Legal Authority.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Lazav és Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Elusive
entries: No attack roll has advantage against Lazav unless he is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Lazav falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Shapechanger Savant
entries: Lazav can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid he has seen. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.name: Psychic Defenses
entries: Unless Lazav is {@condition incapacitated}, he is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with Lazav only if he allows it.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Lazav makes three shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before Lazav's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Lazav makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Lazav casts one of his innate spells.

legendary.name: Shifting Nightmare (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Lazav rapidly takes the form of several nightmarish creatures, lashing out at all nearby. Each creature within 10 feet of Lazav ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21} or take 18 ({@dice 4d8}) damage of a type chosen by Lazav: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or necrotic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The master's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). The master pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Aura of Blood Lust
entries: When any other creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the master, that creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17}, or it must immediately take the Attack action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.

trait.name: Feed on the Crowd
entries: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the master dies, the master gains 15 temporary hit points and has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The master té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The master makes two melee attacks with its spear.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Captivating Presence {@recharge}
entries: Each creature within 120 feet of the master ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition charmed} by the master for 1 hour. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature's speed is 0. If the {@condition charmed} creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Captivating Presence of all masters of cruelties for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Mind Drinker Vampire
languages: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The vampire és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The vampire fa dos atacs, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one willing creature, or a creature that is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

action.name: Mind Siphon {@recharge 5}
entries: The vampire targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 14}, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. Si falla, rep 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany psíquic, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. Si supera, l'objectiu rep la meitat del dany, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The mage's spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: The mage wears a {@item Spies' Murmur|GGR|spies' murmur} (see chapter 5).

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Nightveil Specter
languages: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Mount
entries: If the specter isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto its gloamwing mount, provided the specter and the gloamwing are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not {@condition incapacitated}, the specter can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Destresa saving throws.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The specter makes two scythe attacks.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Mind Twist {@recharge 5}
entries: The specter magically emits psychic energy en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}  qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. La criatura {@condition stunned} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Reap Memory (3/Dia)
entries: The specter touches one {@condition incapacitated} creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24. Unless the creature succeeds on a {@dc 15} Intel·ligència saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Niv-Mizzet is a 20th-level Izzet spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 26} salvada de conjur, {@hit 18} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Locus of the Firemind
entries: Niv-Mizzet can maintain concentration on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration on spells.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Niv-Mizzet té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Master Chemister
entries: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Niv-Mizzet fa tres atacs: one with his bite and two with his claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d4 + 9}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 25}. Qui falli rep 91 ({@damage 26d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: Niv-Mizzet fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 25} or take 14 ({@damage 2d4 + 9}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition prone}. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary.name: Dracogenius (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The cyclops té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cyclops makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Spell Vitalization
entries: Immediately after a creature casts a spell of 1st level or higher within 120 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can move up to twice its speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat. It can then make one slam attack against a target of its choice.

monster.name: Obzedat Ghost

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The ghost és Saviesa ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell chill touch} (at 5th level, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes)

trait.name: Council of Five
entries: The ghost has a trait based on who it is, as shown below:

items.name: Enezesku: Enfeebling Ray.
items.entry: Enezesku's Innate Spellcasting trait includes {@spell ray of enfeeblement}, which he can cast at will.

items.name: Fautomni: Resiliència No-morta.
items.entry: If damage reduces Fautomni to 0 hit points, he ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, Fautomni drops to 1 hit point instead.

items.name: Karlov: Unnatural Vigor.
items.entry: When Karlov regains hit points, he has advantage on attack rolls he makes on his next turn.

items.name: Vuliev: Teleportation.
items.entry: Vuliev's Innate Spellcasting trait includes {@spell misty step}, which he can cast at will.

items.name: Xil Xaxosz: Lingering Spite.
items.entry: When Xil Xaxosz is reduced to 0 hit points, his incorporeal form explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 5 feet of him ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Visió Etèrea
entries: The ghost pot veure el Pla Etèri fins a 60 peus d'abast quan està al Pla Material (i viceversa).

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The ghost pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (1/Dia)
entries: Si the ghost falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or se li redueixen tants punts de cop màxims com dany hagi rebut. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. Aquesta reducció de punts de cop màxims dura fins que the target finishes a long rest.

action.name: Convene the Ghost Council
entries: The ghost summons the other four members of the Obzedat. At the start of the ghost's next turn, the other members appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The ghosts each roll initiative when they appear.

legendaryHeader: If five Obzedat ghosts are all within 30 feet of each other, they can collectively take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. Obzedat ghosts regain spent legendary actions at the start of the turn of the ghost with the highest initiative.

legendary.name: Forced Obedience
entries: A target that all of the Obzedat ghosts can see ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or bow fins el final del seu proper torn. Until this bow ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased.

legendary.name: Indentured Spirits (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The Obzedat ghosts conjure {@dice 1d6} {@creature indentured spirit|ggr|indentured spirits} (described in this chapter) within 60 feet of one of them.

trait.name: Focus
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can target a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the giant's focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the giant drops to 0 hit points. When the giant makes an attack roll against its focus, it adds a {@dice d4} to its attack roll. If the giant attacks a different target while it has a focus, it subtracts a {@dice d4} from its attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) de dany tallant. If the Orzhov giant scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The mage és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Glimpse the Temporal Flood {@recharge 5}
entries: The mage targets one creature within 120 feet of it that it can see. The target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic, and ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

reaction.name: Precognitive Insight (3/Dia)
entries: When the mage or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the mage can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Rakdos's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 25} salvació de conjur). He can innately cast {@spell hellish rebuke} (at 5th level) at will, requiring no material components.

trait.name: Captivating Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 25}. Si falla, the creature becomes {@condition charmed} by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

trait.name: Cruel Entertainment
entries: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Rakdos falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Rakdos té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Rakdos's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Rakdos fa dos atacs with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

action.name: Curtain-Call Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Sadistic Revelry
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of Rakdos that is his ally or is {@condition charmed} by him must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward the creature closest to it that it can see, provided it isn't already within 5 feet of that creature. It then must make one melee attack against that creature if it is able to do so.

legendary.name: Scythe (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Rakdos uses Curtain-Call Scythe.

legendary.name: Touch of Pain (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Rakdos makes a claw attack against one creature within 10 feet of him. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 25} or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature can't maintain concentration on a spell or any other effect that requires concentration. La criatura {@condition poisoned} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The lampooner is a 4th-level Rakdos spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de bard següents:

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The juggler makes three dagger attacks.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fire eater fa dos atacs with its bladed chain.

action.name: Bladed Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spew Flame {@recharge 4}
entries: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature en un con de 15 peus ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The acrobat fa dos atacs with its barbed pole.

action.name: Barbed Pole
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The reckoner is a 5th-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The reckoner has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: First Strike
entries: The reckoner has advantage on initiative rolls.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

reaction.name: Lightning Backlash {@recharge 5}
entries: When a creature hits the reckoner with an attack, the attacker takes lightning damage equal to half the damage dealt by the attack.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the stalker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: The stalker can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Ruin Dweller
entries: The stalker has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in ruins, and its speed is not reduced in difficult terrain composed of rubble.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The stalker fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The stalker fa tres atacs with its shortsword.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Explosive Tank
entries: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. The explosion ignites flammable objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Scorchbringer {@recharge 4}
entries: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Servitor Thrull
languages: understands Common però no pot parlar

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The horror pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Stride
entries: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The horror fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Saviesa amb {@dc 16} o be {@condition frightened} of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Lashing Shadows {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16} or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany necròtic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The sire és Carisma ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The sire pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sire ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18}. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. Si falla, the creature has disadvantage for 1 minute on Saviesa and Carisma checks and on Saviesa and Carisma saves. At the start of each of its turns, the sire can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The sire té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sire fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany tallant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The horror pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Maddening Presence
entries: The horror targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the horror, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17}. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes {@condition paralyzed} fins el final del seu proper torn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the horror's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The roc fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The skyswimmer pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The skyswimmer fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its slam.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19} or be swallowed by the skyswimmer. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the skyswimmer, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the skyswimmer's turns. If the skyswimmer takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the skyswimmer ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the skyswimmer. If the skyswimmer dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Formation Tactics
entries: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained} while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The soldier fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sphinx és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The giant fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two slam attacks. The first of those attacks that hits deals an extra 18 ({@dice 4d8}) damage if the giant has taken damage since its last turn.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 18} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The thought spy és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). The thought spy pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: On each of its turns, the thought spy pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thought spy makes two melee attacks, or it makes three ranged attacks with its daggers.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Trostani és Saviesa ({@dc 24} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Trostani falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Trostani té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Trostani's són màgics.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on her turn, Trostani can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her abast and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

action.name: Touch of Order
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 16} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany radiant, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start of Trostani's next turn.

action.name: Wrath of Mat'Selesnya {@recharge 5}
entries: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Each creature in a 30-foot cube on that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 24}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany contundent and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany tallant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Voice of Harmony
entries: Trostani makes one melee attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Voice of Life
entries: Trostani bestows 20 temporary hit points on another creature she can see within 120 feet of her.

legendary.name: Voice of Order
entries: Trostani casts dispel magic.

legendary.name: Chorus of the Conclave (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Trostani casts suggestion. This counts as one of her daily uses of the spell.

legendary.name: Awaken Grove Guardians (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Trostani animates one or two trees she can see within 120 feet of her, causing them to uproot themselves and become awakened trees (see the Monster Manual for their stat blocks) for 1 minute or until Trostani uses a bonus action to end the effect. These trees understand Druidic and obey Trostani's spoken commands, but can't speak. If she issues no commands to them, the trees do nothing but follow her and take the Dodge action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The medusa és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). The medusa pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The medusa té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Atac Sorpresa
entries: During the first round of combat, the medusa has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is surprised, and it deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The medusa makes two claw attacks. It can also use Mirada Petrificant before or after making these attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: The medusa fixes its gaze on one creature within 60 feet of it that it can see and that can see its eyes. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Si falla per menys es comença a tornar de pedra i està {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

monster.name: Winged Thrull
languages: understands Common però no pot parlar

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The wurm fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Earth Tremors
entries: The wurm creates earth tremors as it moves overland or underground. Any creature that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany contundent and fall {@condition prone}. Any structure or object anchored to the ground that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de força.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 5d6 + 7}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20} or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the wurm's turns. Si the wurm rep 30 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de the wurm. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Zegana is a 15th-level Simic spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Zegana pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Zegana falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Zegana té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Prime Speaker's Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, and the trident emits a thunderous boom. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the prongs of the trident ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Si falla, the creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de tro and is pushed 10 feet away from Zegana. If the creature is underwater, the damage is increased to 13 ({@dice 3d8}). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

action.name: Deluge {@recharge 4}
entries: Zegana conjures a wave of water that crashes down on an area within 120 feet of her. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany contundent and is knocked {@condition prone}. Qui superi takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}. The water spreads out across the ground, extinguishing unprotected flames it comes in contact with, and then vanishes.

legendary.name: Adaptive Skin
entries: Zegana gains resistance to one damage type of her choice-acid, fire, lightning, or thunder-until the start of her next turn.

legendary.name: Trident
entries: Zegana makes one melee attack with the Prime Speaker's Trident.

legendary.name: Enlarge (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Zegana casts enlarge/reduce on herself, using the enlarge option, without expending a spell slot.

legendary.name: Deluge (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Zegana uses Deluge, if available.
